name: Ancient Anathema
description: Solve the mystery of the disappearance of the owner of the cemetery. And do not forget where you have to live a long night.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7. 8. 8.1. 10 Processor: Intel i3 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series / AMD Radeon HD 4000 series 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: Intel i5 3 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500 series / AMD Radeon HD 6000 series 1 GB VRAM. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
